name: license-server
description: A server which watches your organization and outputs license information for repos which contain a package.json file

gitHookSecret.description: This is a secret token value for Github to communicate via webhooks. For more info checkout: https://github.com/Jam3/license-server

gitToken.description: This is an api access token to communicate with Github. For more info checkout: https://github.com/Jam3/license-server

org.description: The organization where repos will live. eg. Jam3

repoRegex.description: This is an optional string which is used to validate which repos can be queried. eg. `project-.+` will ensure that repos starting with the name `project-` will have license files generated.
